General.Name: City Lodge Hotels Ltd
General.Description: City Lodge Hotels Limited engages in operation of hotels in South Africa and internationally. The company operates hotels under the Courtyard, City Lodge, Town Lodge, and Road Lodge brands. It operates 5 Courtyard hotels with 474 rooms; 21 City Lodge hotels with 3,600 rooms; 12 Town Lodge hotels with 1,507 rooms; and 23 Road Lodge hotels with 2,272 rooms. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bryanston, South Africa.
